[[Israel]] |battles=[[Syrian Civil War]] *[[Battle of Aleppo (2012–present)]] **[[Operation Canopus Star]] **[[Operation Rainbow (Syrian Civil War)|Operation Rainbow]] **[[Aleppo offensive (July 2015)]] **[[Aleppo offensive (October–December 2015)]] **[[2016 Southern Aleppo campaign]] **[[Northern Aleppo offensive (2016)]] **[[Aleppo offensive (June–July 2016)]] **[[Aleppo offensive (July–August 2016)]] **[[Aleppo offensive (August–September 2016)]] **[[Aleppo offensive (September 2016)]] *[[Ithriyah-Raqqa offensive (February 2016–present)]] }} '''Liwa al-Quds''' ({{lang-ar|لواء القدس}}) or the '''Jerusalem Brigade''' is a [[Palestinians in Syria|Palestinian-Syrian]] pro-Government group that operates in [[Aleppo]], formed in 2013 by the engineer [[Muhammad al-Sa’eed]]. By the beginning of 2015, the group had suffered 200 killed and over 400 wounded since its establishment.{{cite web|url=http://www.joshualandis.com/blog/overview-of-some-pro-assad-militias/|title=Syria Comment » Archives Overview of some pro-Assad Militias - Syria Comment|work=Syria Comment}} The group is composed of predominately [[Sunni Islam|Sunni]] Palestinians from the [[Al-Nayrab|al-Nayrab district]] as well as the former refugee camp Handarat. Liwa al-Quds is believed to be the largest loyalist auxiliary force operating in Aleppo.{{cite web|url=https://jamestown.org/brief/october-2014-briefs/ |title=The Jamestown Foundation: October 2014 Briefs|work=The Jamestown Foundation}} ==Operational history== The group supported the Syrian Army in its effort to reopen the main supply line to Aleppo in 2015.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-reopens-the-ithriyah-salamiyah-road-in-east-hama-after-defeating-isis/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army Reopens the Ithriyah-Salamiyah Road in East Hama After Defeating ISIS|author=Leith Fadel|date=24 October 2015|work=Al-Masdar News}} ==See also== *[[List of armed groups in the Syrian Civil War]] *[[Palestinians in Syria]] ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Anti-ISIL factions in Syria]] [[Category:Palestinian militant groups]] [[Category:Pro-government factions of the Syrian Civil War]] [[Category:Military units and formations established in 2013]]
